nodes.text: The Shattered Prison was the name given to the southern edge of Section X, a region of the Belsavis prison on the planet Belsavis. The prison yard along the cliff was ravaged by groundquakes, and the Rakata Aurora Cannon was located in the eastern corner.
The Shattered Prison appears in Section X, a Daily Area added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.5.
